triviaQuestion: Can you guess where the named Atlu Bola originated?
info: It was named with the stone roller that built by Tiring Mercado. Ordinary rollers would have two “bolas” but the one she built had three.

triviaQuestion: Can you guess where the Bical named?
info: The barangay Bical was named after the “bical” grass. It is a slender, climbing bamboo that once grew abundantly in the area.

triviaQuestion: Did you know the old name of Brgy. Bundagul?
info: Brgy. Bundagul old name was masulput, as its open fields were full of “sulpot” which is a local term for amorseco plants with thistles that clung to clothes.
